name: Morning Glory Apple Loaf
description: Turn Morning Glory Muffin Mix into a stellar, gluten-free loaf with real bits of real carrot, apple, cranberry, and coconut.
preparation: Dice unpeeled apple. Chop cold butter into small pieces and set aside.
In a large bowl, whisk egg and milk. Stir in muffin mix. Using a spoon, fold in diced apple and butter; don’t overwork batter.

Scrape batter into steamer. Microwave uncovered on high for 8 min. Rest in steamer 6 min; invert onto Cooling Rack. Cool completely before serving. Or, bake in preheated 350° F oven, 50–55 min. Cool in steamer 15 min, then unmold.

products.name: Morning Glory Muffin Mix (2pk)
summary: Say good morning to moist, gluten free muffins packed with chunks of carrots, apples, coconut, and cranberries. Bake a batch in the microwave in just 15 mins and take a moment to enjoy a warm fruity muffin with your fave warm drink – or easily take them on the go any time of day!

products.name: Cooling Rack (Set of 2)
summary: These space-saving cooling racks are an absolute must-have for every at-home baker or chef.

products.name: Rectangular Steamer
summary: Easy to clean. Easy to serve. Rectangular, silicone steamer is perfect for side dishes & desserts.
